Deprecated API

Contents

Deprecated Classes
inspiracio.lang.StringBufferUtils
          Prefer StringBuilder over StringBuffer. 
 

Deprecated Methods
inspiracio.xml.DOM.getTextContent(Node)
          When we have Java 5, eliminate this method and use Node.getTextContent() directly instead. 
inspiracio.servlet.http.HttpURL.toStringBuffer()
          Use StringBuilder instead.
